Text: An excellent presentation - many thanks for this and looking forward to the complete series.

This is a propaganda documentary. The first known Australian were the Mungo People. They were annihilated by the Aborigines.

The hosts are all socialists and other communists. What they are preaching is the division of current Aborigines and White Australia, therefore giving land to the so called owners and then the miners come in and blackmail the tribe leaders. An attack from Untied Nations.
